author: ABC News
title: White House walks back Trump's call for US to leave Syria 'very soon'
description:
In a statement meant to clarify the U.S. presence in Syria, the White House did not announce an immediate withdrawal of U.S. forces, despite President Donald Trump's repeated calls in the past week to leave the country "very soon."
"The military mission to er…

author: ABC News
title: US markets open sharply lower amid trade war fears with China
description:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average tumbled 500 points at today's open over concerns about a possible trade war with China.
The Nasdaq and S&P 500 also opened lower, and both the Dow and S&P are now in correction territory again.
On Tuesday, the Trump administra…

author: ABC News
title: Martin Luther King Jr.'s granddaughter reflects 50 years after his assassination
description: Martin Luther King Jr. was assassinated 50 years ago in Memphis.

author: ABC News
title: Facebook now says up to 87 million users' data improperly shared
description:
Facebook has sharply increased the number of users whose data it says may have been improperly shared with the data analytics firm, Cambridge Analytica – from up to 50 million to now up to 87 million people.
The revelation Wednesday came in a Facebook release…

author: ABC News
title: How the shooting at YouTube's Calif. headquarters unfolded
description: The lunchtime shooting sent YouTube employees fleeing for their lives.

author: ABC News
title: CIA director nominee will explain role in torture program
description: The top U.S. intelligence official says President Donald Trump's nominee to be CIA director will fully explain her role in the harsh interrogation practices used on terror suspects after 9/11. Dan Coats told reporters on Wednesday that he's spent a lot of tim…

author: ABC News
title: Water park co-owner booked into Kansas jail on murder charge
description: A water park co-owner has been booked into a jail in Kansas, where he's charged with a 10-year-old boy's decapitation death on a 17-story waterslide that was promoted as the world's largest. Records show that Schlitterbahn co-owner Jeff Henry was booked into …

author: ABC News
title: Farm state lawmakers, including Republicans, blame Trump for new China tariffs
description: Senators from major soybean-producing states in the Midwest, including Republicans, are steaming over China’s threat to impose tariffs on U.S. soy exports, blaming President Donald Trump's aggressive actions against China for the trade retaliation that could …

author: ABC News
title: Twitter cracks down on accounts accused of spreading false information
description: The actions come amid continued concerns over the online spread of false information that occurs on social media around shootings and other major news events.

author: ABC News
title: Family of alleged YouTube shooter warned police 'she might do something'
description: The suspect, Nasim Najafi Aghdam, reportedly had a vendetta against YouTube.
